00001 #!/usr/local/bin/perl -w

00003 use warnings;

00005 # Course manipulation functions for webwork webservices
00006 
00007 package WebworkWebservice::CourseActions;

00009 use WebworkWebservice;

00011 use base qw(WebworkWebservice); 
00012 use WeBWorK::DB;
00013 use WeBWorK::DB::Utils qw(initializeUserProblem);

00021 sub create {
00022     my ($self, $params) = @_;
00023     my $newcourse = $params->{'name'};
00024     # note this ce is different from $self->{ce}!
00025     my $ce = WeBWorK::CourseEnvironment->new({
00026             webwork_dir => $self->{ce}->{webwork_dir},
00027             courseName => $newcourse
00028         });
00029     my $db = $self->{db};
00030     my $authz = $self->{authz};
00031     my $out = {};
00032 
00033     debug("Webservices course creation request.");
00034     # make sure course actions are enabled
00035     if (!$ce->{webservices}{enableCourseActions}) {
00036         debug("Course actions disabled by configuration.");
00037         $out->{status} = "failure";
00038         $out->{message} = "Course actions disabled by configuration.";
00039         return $out
00040     }
00041     # only users from the admin course with appropriate permissions allowed
00042     if (!($self->{ce}->{courseName} eq 'admin')) {
00043         debug("Course creation attempt when not logged into admin course.");
00044         $out->{status} = "failure";
00045         $out->{message} = "Course creation allowed only for admin course users.";
00046         return $out
00047     }
00048     # prof check is actually done when initiating session, this is just in case
00049     if (!$self->{authz}->hasPermissions($params->{'userID'}, 
00050             'create_and_delete_courses')) {
00051         debug("Course creation attempt with insufficient permission level.");
00052         $out->{status} = "failure";
00053         $out->{message} = "Insufficient permission level.";
00054         return $out
00055     }
00056     
00057     # declare params
00058     my @professors = ();
00059     my $dbLayout = $ce->{dbLayoutName};
00060     my %courseOptions = ( dbLayoutName => $dbLayout );
00061     my %dbOptions;
00062     my @users;
00063     my %optional_arguments;
00064 
00065     my $userClass = $ce->{dbLayouts}->{$dbLayout}->{user}->{record};
00066     my $passwordClass = $ce->{dbLayouts}->{$dbLayout}->{password}->{record};
00067     my $permissionClass = $ce->{dbLayouts}->{$dbLayout}->{permission}->{record};
00068 
00069     # copy instructors from admin course
00070     # modified from do_add_course in WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::CourseAdmin
00071     foreach my $userID ($db->listUsers) {
00072         my $User            = $db->getUser($userID);
00073         my $Password        = $db->getPassword($userID);
00074         my $PermissionLevel = $db->getPermissionLevel($userID);
00075         push @users, [ $User, $Password, $PermissionLevel ] 
00076             if $authz->hasPermissions($userID,"create_and_delete_courses");  
00077     }
00078 
00079     # all data prepped, try to actually add the course
00080     eval {
00081         addCourse(
00082             courseID => $newcourse,
00083             ce => $ce,
00084             courseOptions => \%courseOptions,
00085             dbOptions => \%dbOptions,
00086             users => \@users,
00087             %optional_arguments,
00088         );
00089         addLog($ce, "New course created: " . $newcourse);
00090         $out->{status} = "success";
00091     } or do {
00092         $out->{status} = "failure";
00093         $out->{message} = $@;
00094     };
00095     
00096     return $out;
00097 }

00099 sub addUser {
00100     my ($self, $params) = @_;
00101     my $out = {};
00102     my $db = $self->{db};
00103     my $ce = $self->{ce};
00104     debug("Webservices add user request.");
00105 
00106     # make sure course actions are enabled
00107     if (!$ce->{webservices}{enableCourseActions}) {
00108         $out->{status} = "failure";
00109         $out->{message} = "Course actions disabled by configuration.";
00110         return $out
00111     }
00112 
00113     # Two scenarios
00114     # 1. New user
00115     # 2. Dropped user deciding to re-enrol
00116 
00117     my $olduser = $db->getUser($params->{id});
00118     my $id = $params->{'id'};
00119     my $permission; # stores user's permission level
00120     if ($olduser) { 
00121         # a dropped user decided to re-enrol
00122         my $enrolled = $self->{ce}->{statuses}->{Enrolled}->{abbrevs}->[0];
00123         $olduser->status($enrolled);
00124         $db->putUser($olduser);
00125         addLog($ce, "User ". $id . " re-enrolled in " . 
00126             $ce->{courseName});
00127         $out->{status} = 'success';
00128         $permission = $db->getPermissionLevel($id);
00129     }
00130     else {
00131         # a new user showed up
00132         my $ce = $self->{ce};
00133         
00134         # student record
00135         my $enrolled = $ce->{statuses}->{Enrolled}->{abbrevs}->[0];
00136         my $new_student = $db->{user}->{record}->new();
00137         $new_student->user_id($id);
00138         $new_student->first_name($params->{'firstname'});
00139         $new_student->last_name($params->{'lastname'});
00140         $new_student->status($enrolled);
00141         $new_student->student_id($params->{'studentid'});
00142         $new_student->email_address($params->{'email'});
00143         
00144         # password record
00145         my $cryptedpassword = "";
00146         if ($params->{'userpassword'}) {
00147             $cryptedpassword = cryptPassword($params->{'userpassword'});
00148         }
00149         elsif ($new_student->student_id()) {
00150             $cryptedpassword = cryptPassword($new_student->student_id());
00151         }
00152         my $password = $db->newPassword(user_id => $id);
00153         $password->password($cryptedpassword);
00154         
00155         # permission record
00156         $permission = $params->{'permission'};
00157         if (defined($ce->{userRoles}{$permission})) {
00158             $permission = $db->newPermissionLevel(
00159                 user_id => $id, 
00160                 permission => $ce->{userRoles}{$permission});
00161         }
00162         else {
00163             $permission = $db->newPermissionLevel(user_id => $id, 
00164                 permission => $ce->{userRoles}{student});
00165         }
00166 
00167         # commit changes to db
00168         $out->{status} = 'success';
00169         eval{ $db->addUser($new_student); };
00170         if ($@) {
00171             $out->{status} = 'failure';
00172             $out->{message} = "Add user for $id failed!\n";
00173         }
00174         eval { $db->addPassword($password); };
00175         if ($@) {
00176             $out->{status} = 'failure';
00177             $out->{message} = "Add password for $id failed!\n";
00178         }
00179         eval { $db->addPermissionLevel($permission); };
00180         if ($@) {
00181             $out->{status} = 'failure';
00182             $out->{message} = "Add permission for $id failed!\n";
00183         }
00184 
00185         addLog($ce, "User ". $id . " newly added in " . 
00186             $ce->{courseName});
00187     }
00188 
00189     # only students are assigned homework
00190     if ($ce->{webservices}{courseActionsAssignHomework} &&
00191         $permission->{permission} == $ce->{userRoles}{student}) {
00192         debug("Assigning homework.");
00193         my $ret = assignVisibleSets($db, $id);
00194         if ($ret) {
00195             $out->{status} = 'failure';
00196             $out->{message} = "User created but unable to assign sets. $ret";
00197         }
00198     }
00199 
00200     return $out;
00201 }

00203 sub dropUser {
00204     my ($self, $params) = @_;
00205     my $db = $self->{db};
00206     my $ce = $self->{ce};
00207     my $out = {};
00208     debug("Webservices drop user request.");
00209 
00210     # make sure course actions are enabled
00211     if (!$ce->{webservices}{enableCourseActions}) {
00212         $out->{status} = "failure";
00213         $out->{message} = "Course actions disabled by configuration.";
00214         return $out
00215     }
00216 
00217     # Mark user as dropped
00218     my $drop = $self->{ce}->{statuses}->{Drop}->{abbrevs}->[0];
00219     my $person = $db->getUser($params->{'id'});
00220     if ($person) {
00221         $person->status($drop);
00222         $db->putUser($person);
00223         addLog($ce, "User ". $person->user_id() . " dropped from " . 
00224             $ce->{courseName});
00225         $out->{status} = 'success';
00226     }
00227     else {
00228         $out->{status} = 'failure';
00229         $out->{message} = 'Could not find user';
00230     }
00231 
00232     return $out;
00233 }
00234 
00235 sub addLog {
00236     my ($ce, $msg) = @_;
00237     if (!$ce->{webservices}{enableCourseActionsLog}) {
00238         return;
00239     }
00240     my ($sec, $msec) = gettimeofday;
00241     my $date = time2str("%a %b %d %H:%M:%S.$msec %Y", $sec);
00242 
00243     $msg = "[$date] $msg\n";
00244 
00245     my $logfile = $ce->{webservices}{courseActionsLogfile};
00246     if (open my $f, ">>", $logfile) {
00247         print $f $msg;
00248         close $f;
00249     }
00250     else {
00251         debug("Error, unable to open student updates log file '$logfile' in".
00252             "append mode: $!");
00253     }
00254     return;
00255 }
00256 
00257 sub assignVisibleSets {
00258     my ($db, $userID) = @_;
00259     my @globalSetIDs = $db->listGlobalSets;
00260     my @GlobalSets = $db->getGlobalSets(@globalSetIDs);
00261 
00262     my $i = -1;
00263     foreach my $GlobalSet (@GlobalSets) {
00264         $i++;
00265         if (not defined $GlobalSet) {
00266             debug("Record not found for global set $globalSetIDs[$i]");
00267             next;
00268         } 
00269         if (!$GlobalSet->visible) {
00270             next;
00271         }
00272 
00273         # assign set to user
00274         my $setID = $GlobalSet->set_id;
00275         my $UserSet = $db->newUserSet;
00276         $UserSet->user_id($userID);
00277         $UserSet->set_id($setID);
00278         my @results;
00279         my $set_assigned = 0;
00280         eval { $db->addUserSet($UserSet) }; 
00281         if ( $@ && !($@ =~ m/user set exists/)) {
00282             return "Failed to assign set to user $userID";
00283         }
00284 
00285         # assign problem
00286         my @GlobalProblems = grep { defined $_ } $db->getAllGlobalProblems($setID);
00287         foreach my $GlobalProblem (@GlobalProblems) {
00288             my $seed = int( rand( 2423) ) + 36;
00289             my $UserProblem = $db->newUserProblem;
00290             $UserProblem->user_id($userID);
00291             $UserProblem->set_id($GlobalProblem->set_id);
00292             $UserProblem->problem_id($GlobalProblem->problem_id);
00293             initializeUserProblem($UserProblem, $seed);
00294             eval { $db->addUserProblem($UserProblem) };
00295             if ($@ && !($@ =~ m/user problem exists/)) {
00296                 return "Failed to assign problems to user $userID";
00297             }
00298         }
00299     }
00300 
00301     return 0;
00302 }
